attributes.action: No Convicted Criminals allowed to sit in the House of Commons or the House of Lords
attributes.additional_details: Any member of the House of Commons or the House of Lords convicted of a criminal offence no matter how large or small should automatically be expelled from their position and loose all of their rights & privilages. How can honest, hard working members of this country be expected to behave when these people are allowed to resume their duties in bestowing & creating laws that we all have to abide by when they themselves are guilty by conviction. This is just blatant hypocrisy.
